Info:
The Scuffle has started!
Weaknesses: Mage -> Warrior -> Archer -> Thief -> Beast -> Mage
Strengths: Mage <- Archer <- Beast <- Warrior <- Thief <- Mage
The Mage Special reveals all cards from the computer\'s hand.
The Warrior Special doubles the stakes of honor for the round.
The Archer Special eliminates a targeted card from the computer\'s hand.
The Thief Special swaps itself with a random card from computer\'s hand.
The Beast Special mimics a random card you have previously played.
Two Specials can be used per round. They have various effects.
Specials are activated by discarding a selected card from your hand.
10 Rounds are played in a match. The stronger card wins its owner honor.
Both players refill their hands with 5 fresh cards each round.
Scuffle is an Android Workshop project by Henry H. and Kevin L.
Scuffle is actually a reimplementation of the original game made by Henry H. and Kevin L.
Scuffle is based on the Five-elements theory.
